intro: Senecio duriaei, commonly known as the Duriaei groundsel, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It is a perennial herb that typically grows in arid or semi-arid environments. The plant features narrow, linear leaves and produces small, yellowish flowers arranged in dense clusters. It is part of the Asteraceae family, which includes daisies and sunflowers. Due to its unique appearance and habitat, it is often cultivated in succulent gardens for its ornamental value.
